title: Can no longer post on NA forums
body:
I have always spent most of my time on the NA forums, since most subjects are server-agnostic and the NA forums both have all the sub-forums and not just the handful here, and because there are more people there to talk to.

Now it will not let me post there because I do not have an NA account of level 4 or level 6. I can't even post there to complain about this change.

Please change this back.

replies.body: Couldn't you just use your OCE account in the first place?
That is what I used to be able to do, and then I could not. It also stopped me posting here on the OCE forums, but for some reason that didn't start until later.
